description.narrative: The Project's Development Objective (PDO) is to improve transport conditions and bring sustained access to the rural populationthrough rehabilitating and maintaining key rural transport infrastructure in a sustainable manner in selected Nigerianstates.

The Government of the Federal Republic of Nigeria

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :SCHEDULE 2: Project Execution | Description :-Allocation by each tier-one state government of sufficient annualbudget resources to SPIU in order to be able to finance the maintenance costs of pilot roads and roads rehabilitated byRAMP-2- Allocation by each tier-one state government of sufficient annual budget resources in order to sustain a SPIU with allcore staff positions being filled by professional staffs with profile and experience | Frequency :Yearly
